\Aura\SqlGatewayLocator

A ServiceLocator implementation for loading and retaining gateway objects.

$converted : array

Tracks whether or not a registry entry has been converted from a callable to a gateway object.

Methods

__construct()

__construct(array $registry)

Constructor.

Parameters

array $registry

An array of key-value pairs where the key is the gateway name and the value is a callable that returns a gateway object.
